member.name: T:M2BobPatcher.Downloaders.HttpClientDownloader
member.summary: An error-handler and user-friendly downloader class, used to download any file needed by the AutoPatcher through http.

member.name: F:M2BobPatcher.Downloaders.HttpClientDownloader.HttpClient
member.summary: The downloader client itself.

member.name: M:M2BobPatcher.Downloaders.HttpClientDownloader.DownloadData(System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method tries to download a specific file (address) a pre-defined number of times (DownloaderConfigs.MAX_DOWNLOAD_RETRIES_PER_FILE). It is also responsible for putting the BackgroundWorker Thread to sleep a pre-defined amount of time (DownloaderConfigs.INTERVAL_MS_BETWEEN_DOWNLOAD_RETRIES) between each download retry. It uses the Download method for that purpose, calling it with the received arguments. It waits for the returned Download's Task to finish before returning the downloaded content as a byte[].

member.name: M:M2BobPatcher.Downloaders.HttpClientDownloader.Download(System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method tries to return a Task responsible to download a specific file (address). If it completes the download, it checks if the hash of the downloaded file equals the expected hash of that same file (expectedHash), throwing an InvalidDataException if it doesn't. If the expected hash is null, it assumes that the downloaded file is the server metadata and executes the respective sanity check on it, throwing an InvalidDataException if something is wrong with it. This method also logs the download progress to the respective progress bar through the BackgroundWorker (bw), whenever it assumes it is necessary.

member.name: T:M2BobPatcher.Engine.IPatcherEngine
member.summary: This interface represents the engine with all its core logic behind the AutoPatcher. It contains the public API calls that an external application may access regarding it.

member.name: M:M2BobPatcher.Engine.IPatcherEngine.Patch
member.summary: Performs the required steps in order to try to fully patch M2Bob.

member.name: T:M2BobPatcher.Engine.PatcherEngine
member.summary: A pipeline-action-based engine class, with all its core logic behind the AutoPatcher.

member.name: F:M2BobPatcher.Engine.PatcherEngine.LocalMetadata
member.summary: The LocalMetadata stores the metadata obtained from the local files. It is stored in a thread-safe structure since it is going to be accessed concurrently.

member.name: F:M2BobPatcher.Engine.PatcherEngine.ServerMetadata
member.summary: The ServerMetadata stores the metadata obtained from the server.

member.name: F:M2BobPatcher.Engine.PatcherEngine.BW
member.summary: The BackgroundWorker instance, used to contact the UI Thread.

member.name: F:M2BobPatcher.Engine.PatcherEngine.PatchDirectory
member.summary: The url to the actual server directory with the M2Bob files.

member.name: F:M2BobPatcher.Engine.PatcherEngine.Pipeline
member.summary: A pipeline containing the steps to follow in order to try to guarantee a successful patch. Every action-step knows its relative order.

member.name: M:M2BobPatcher.Engine.PatcherEngine.#ctor(System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PatcherEngine class with the specified BackgroundWorker.

member.name: M:M2BobPatcher.Engine.PatcherEngine.M2BobPatcher#Engine#IPatcherEngine#Patch
member.summary: Performs the required steps in order to try to fully patch M2Bob. The time it takes for it to patch is measured through a Stopwatch. Every current step's description is outputted to the respective Label in the UI Thread through the BackgroundWorker.

member.name: M:M2BobPatcher.Engine.PatcherEngine.DownloadContent(System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Invokes the FileSystemExplorer to try to download and write a list of specific files (content) to the disk. isMissingContent is true if the method is invoked as a mean to download missing content, or false if to download outdated content. After the downloads and writes are completed, the local metadata is refreshed.

member.name: M:M2BobPatcher.Engine.PatcherEngine.GenerateServerMetadata(System.Int32)
member.summary: Invokes the DownloadServerMetadataFile() method, receiving a previously checked server's metadata file. It then parses it, and stores its content in the ServerMetadata global variable.

member.name: M:M2BobPatcher.Engine.PatcherEngine.CalculateMissingContent
member.summary: Returns a list containing the server files' names that are not present locally.

member.name: M:M2BobPatcher.Engine.PatcherEngine.CalculateOutdatedContent
member.summary: Returns a list containing the server files' names which their md5 hash differs from the respective local files' md5 hash.

member.name: M:M2BobPatcher.Engine.PatcherEngine.DownloadServerMetadataFile
member.summary: Downloads and validates the server metadata file. Returns it as a string.

member.name: M:M2BobPatcher.Engine.PatcherEngine.GenerateLocalMetadata
member.summary: Asks the FileSystemExplorer for a fresh copy of the local metadata performed in a concurrent way.

member.name: M:M2BobPatcher.Engine.PatcherEngine.DownloadMissingContent(System.Int32)
member.summary: Invokes CalculateMissingContent() and then downloads the received list of missing files.

member.name: M:M2BobPatcher.Engine.PatcherEngine.DownloadOutdatedContent(System.Int32)
member.summary: Invokes CalculateOutdatedContent() and then downloads the received list of outdated files.

member.name: M:M2BobPatcher.Engine.PatcherEngine.GetCurrentStepProgress(System.Int32)
member.summary: Calculates the current progress percentage, based on the received step.

member.name: M:M2BobPatcher.Engine.PatcherEngine.LogDownloadingEvent(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Informs the UI Thread that a specific type of download (missing content or outdated content) is taking progress, if that's the case.

member.name: M:M2BobPatcher.Engine.PatcherEngine.PerformLastSanityChecks
member.summary: Checks if there are still any missing or outdated content after successfully applying the patch, throwing a new FileNotFoundException or DataTamperedException respectively if that's the case.

member.name: M:M2BobPatcher.Engine.PatcherEngine.Finish(System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch)
member.summary: Invokes PerformLastSanityChecks(), performing some last second sanity check, and stops the Stopwatch timer informing the UI Thread that the patch is completed.

member.name: T:M2BobPatcher.ExceptionHandler.Exceptions.DataTamperedException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown whenever an external entity tampered any data it shouldn't.

member.name: M:M2BobPatcher.ExceptionHandler.Exceptions.DataTamperedException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DataTamperedException class.

member.name: M:M2BobPatcher.ExceptionHandler.Exceptions.DataTamperedException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DataTamperedException class with a specified error message.

member.name: M:M2BobPatcher.ExceptionHandler.Exceptions.DataTamperedException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DataTamperedException class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

member.name: T:M2BobPatcher.ExceptionHandler.Handler
member.summary: The class responsible for all exception handling during the patch.

member.name: M:M2BobPatcher.ExceptionHandler.Handler.Handle(System.Exception)
member.summary: Handles the received Exception based on its type. Any un-cased exception triggers an unknown error prompt.

member.name: M:M2BobPatcher.ExceptionHandler.Handler.ShowError(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Informs the user, through a MessageBox whose text and caption are received in argument, that something went wrong while patching. Exits the application terminating all Threads after the user clicks in the OK button.

member.name: M:M2BobPatcher.FileSystem.FileSystemExplorer.GenerateLocalMetadata(System.String[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a refreshed version of the local metadata. This method accomplishes this by reading from the disk all the files whose name match those in filePaths and calculating their md5 hashes concurrently.

member.summary: Tries to download and write a specific file (resource) to the disk in a defined path. This method creates the respective parent directory, if needed.

member.summary: Checks if a file exists.

member.summary: Used to represent the metadata of a file.

member.summary: Computes the md5 hash of the received byte[] array and returns it as a string. Invokes NormalizeMd5() for the conversion.

member.name: M:M2BobPatcher.Hash.Md5HashFactory.GeneratedMd5HashFromStream(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Computes the md5 hash of the received Stream and returns it as a string. Invokes NormalizeMd5() for the conversion.

member.summary: Converts the byte[] md5 hash received into a string.

member.summary: Checks if the received AggregateException contains at least one ObjectDisposedException.

member.name: F:M2BobPatcher.Resources.Configs.DownloaderConfigs.INTERVAL_MS_BETWEEN_DOWNLOAD_RETRIES
member.summary: The time (in milliseconds) that the downloader will spend sleeping before retrying a failed download.

member.name: F:M2BobPatcher.Resources.Configs.DownloaderConfigs.TIMEOUT_MS_WAITING_FOR_READ
member.summary: The time (in milliseconds) that the downloader will spend waiting for the current read request to be completed before closing the stream by force, thus throwing an ObjectDisposedException.
